Module jam
Package jam.GameLogic

Class GameLogic

java.lang.Object
jam.GameLogic.GameLogic
public class GameLogic extends Object
Contain logic of how game can move.

    • setLENGTH

      public static void setLENGTH(int cellsMax)
      Setter of length which is side of cell.
      Parameters:
      cellsMax - Get the bigger number between row and column.

    • getLENGTH

      static double getLENGTH()
      Getter for length of side of the cells.
      Returns:
      side length of cell.

    • randomFillNumber

      private void randomFillNumber()
      This function fill a random cell by 2 or 4.

    • haveEmptyCell

      private int haveEmptyCell()
      This method check through the cell for 0 and wining number.
      Returns:
      return 1 if got empty cell, return 0 when wining number is checked, return -1 if no empty cell found.

    • passDestination

      private int passDestination(int i, int j, char direct)
      This method return the coordinate of an empty cell along the cell moving direction
      Parameters:
      i - Cell object x coordinate
      j - Cell object y coordinate
      direct - Direction of movement
      Returns:
      　int variable which contain the target x or y coordinate.

    • isValidDesH

      private boolean isValidDesH(int i, int j, int des, int sign)
      Check whether the given cell[i][j] can move to given horizontal destination or not.
      Parameters:
      i - x coordinate of cell.
      j - coordinate of cell.
      des - Destination to pass.
      sign - direction of the pass.
      Returns:
      Return true if can pass, false if cannot.

    • moveHorizontally

      private void moveHorizontally(int i, int j, int des, int sign)
      Add the score and value of cell and delete the original cell if can merge, move cell position if can move.
      Parameters:
      i - x coordinate of cell.
      j - coordinate of cell.
      des - Destination to pass.
      sign - direction of the pass.

    • isValidDesV

      private boolean isValidDesV(int i, int j, int des, int sign)
      Check whether the given cell[i][j] can move to given vertically destination or not.
      Parameters:
      i - x coordinate of cell.
      j - coordinate of cell.
      des - Destination to pass.
      sign - direction of the pass.
      Returns:
      true if can pass, false if cannot.

    • moveVertically

      private void moveVertically(int i, int j, int des, int sign)
      Add the score and value of cell and delete the original cell if can merge, move cell position if can move.
      Parameters:
      i - x coordinate of cell.
      j - coordinate of cell.
      des - Destination to pass.
      sign - direction of the pass.

    • haveSameNumberNearly

      private boolean haveSameNumberNearly(int i, int j)
      This method check whether there a same number cell at right side or downside. Here have a bug about if the only cell which have number nearby is bottom-right cell, it will still consider as loss.
      Parameters:
      i - x coordinate for the cell which need to check.
      j - y coordinate for the cell which need to check.
      Returns:
      Return true in have same number nearby, false if not.

    • canNotMove

      private boolean canNotMove()
      This method check whether the game can move or not.
      Returns:
      false if game still can move, true if not.

    • switchToEndGame

      private void switchToEndGame()
      This is a method which will switch to endGame scene and take the game score and assign in a lable in the endGame scene.

    • getGridAry

      private String getGridAry()
      This function used to get array of number.
      Returns:
      Return an array of number which represent current grid status.

    • victory

      private void victory()
      This function handle the victory condition. Popup a alert to check user want to continue or not.

    • game

      public void game(javafx.scene.Group root, javafx.scene.control.Label scoreText) throws IOException
      This is main logic for the game.
      Parameters:
      root - This is the root of the game which is center of the border pane.
      scoreText - This is label of the score which will update during each move.
      Throws:
      IOException - IOError
